scripts.site:build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production sitepack build -c site/config/sitepack.config.js -o site/build
scripts.site:publish: npm run site:clean && npm run site:build && cp ./CNAME site/build && cd site/build && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'update docs' && git checkout -b gh-pages && touch .nojekyll && git add . && git commit -am 'update docs' && git push git@github.com:jamesknelson/junctions gh-pages --force
